LISP

The root of lisp is very interesting thing.

All langauge heading to Lisp.

Lambda function. List processing and so on.

Lisp has no syntax because you work on abstract syntax tree (AST).

Lisp has a macro system no other language has.

Lisp is like atoms to build materials.

Lisp is not an invention, but more of a discovery.
